CustomField.inlineHelpText: By checking this box, the following text will be written to the VistA progress note: “Patient advised that recommendation for care provided during the call does not constitute an approval for authorization for payment by the VA or its staff. Patient advised to report a community ED visit to the national Office of Community Care at 1-844-724-7842 within 72 hours.”
CustomField.label: Emergency Department Payment Disclaimer
